---test---
NAME: TestGetStringPseudoOnline
COMMENT: test GetString()

---data---
type: GetString
locale: en
component: about
key: about.message
source: message in code
expect: message in code

---data---
type: GetString
locale: en
component: about
key: about.message
expect: Your application description page.

---data---
type: GetString
locale: de
component: about
key: about.message
expect: #@Your application description page.#@

---data---
type: GetString
locale: de
component: about
key: about.message
source: Your application description page.
expect: #@Your application description page.#@

---data---
type: GetString
locale: de
component: about
key: about.message
source: message in code
expect: #@Your application description page.#@



---test---
NAME: TestGetStringPseudoOnlineOnly
COMMENT: test GetString()

---data---
type: GetString
locale: de
component: aboutadd
key: about.message
expect: about.message

---data---
type: GetString
locale: de
component: aboutadd
key: about.message
source: message in code
expect: @@message in code@@

---data---
type: GetString
locale: de
component: common
key: common.about
expect: @@About latest@@



---test---
NAME: TestGetStringPseudoOnlineWithLocal
COMMENT: test GetString()

---data---
type: GetString
locale: de
component: aboutadd
key: about.message
expect: @@Your application description page. add@@

---data---
type: GetString
locale: de
component: aboutadd
key: about.message
source: message in code
expect: @@Your application description page. add@@

---data---
type: GetString
locale: de
component: aboutadd
key: about.message9
source: message in code
expect: @@message in code@@

---data---
type: GetString
locale: de
component: aboutadd
key: about.message9
expect: about.message9



---test---
NAME: TestGetStringPseudoOffline
COMMENT: test GetString()

---data---
type: GetString
locale: de
component: aboutadd
key: about.message9
expect: about.message9

---data---
type: GetString
locale: de
component: aboutadd
key: about.message9
source: message in code
expect: @@message in code@@

---data---
type: GetString
locale: de
component: aboutadd
key: about.message
expect: @@Your application description page. add@@

---data---
type: GetString
locale: de
component: aboutadd
key: about.message
source: message in code
expect: @@Your application description page. add@@

---data---
type: GetString
locale: de
component: aboutadd
key: about.description
expect: @@Use this area to provide additional information add@@
